text: A man crossing a field met a tiger. He ran away and the tiger ran after him. When he reached a cliff, he grabbed the root of a wild vine and hung from the edge. The tiger could smell it from above. The man, trembling, looked down and saw that at the bottom of the cliff, another tiger was waiting to devour him. Only the vine held it, but now two mice started biting it little by little. Meanwhile, the man saw a juicy strawberry near him. Holding on to the vine with one hand, he tore the strawberry with the other. What a sweet taste it had! FIN
title: Dulce fresa
author: nan Anónimo
